headline: Why Insulet (PODD) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of insulin delivery company Insulet Corporation (NASDAQ:PODD) fell 4.3% in the morning session after the company announced a change in its chief financial officer, a move that appeared to overshadow an otherwise positive update to its sales forecast.
